data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

It ____ mild year-round in ____ mountain ____, ____ a ____ subtropical ____ in ____ areas ____ rainforest ____ lowlands. The Pacific coastal ____ has a tropical ____ with a severe ____ season. The climate in the Andean highlands is temperate and relatively dry, and the Amazon basin on the eastern side of the mountains shares the climate of other rainforest zones.

It i_ mild year-round in t__ mountain val____, wi__ a hu___ subtropical cli____ in coa____ areas a__ rainforest i_ lowlands. The Pacific coastal ar__ has a tropical cli____ with a severe ra___ season. The climate in the Andean highlands is temperate and relatively dry, and the Amazon basin on the eastern side of the mountains shares the climate of other rainforest zones.
data.answer: 气候的变化很大程度上是由海拔高低决定的。在山谷里全年都是温和的，在沿海地区有湿润的亚热带气候，在低地有雨林。太平洋沿岸地区为热带气候，雨季严重。安第斯高地的气候温和且相对干燥，山脉东侧的亚马逊盆地与其他热带雨林地区的气候相同。
